description: Fused with a blackberry flavour this apple makes a delicious on-the-go snack.
Crispy and Tangy, this apple is full of nutrients and vitamins.
With the scent of bubble gum, this apple sets a romantic mood for its owner.
The taste of a juicy and grapey apple becomes a perfect remedy for any rainy day.
Highly nutritious, this banana introduces minty conditions to taste buds.
If you are a fan of fine wine, this non-alcoholic fruit will surely make your day.
Each banana in this bunch represents the colours of the rainbow, and this is a great way to share fruits with friends.
If you like strawberries, then this is your best bet.
These grapes are as blue as the sky
These red grapes contain the best vitimans on the earth
Special yellow grapes for that special person
